Privacy furuy.com is a personal blog. No ads or tracking tools are used.
What data may be processed? Server logs: The site is hosted on GitHub Pages. The hosting/CDN layer may generate technical logs (IP address, request time, requested URL, user agent, etc.) for security and performance purposes. Third-party services Comments (Giscus / GitHub Discussions): Comments are provided via Giscus and backed by GitHub Discussions. Loading the comments section sends requests to Giscus and GitHub infrastructure; posting may require a GitHub account and authorization. Giscus Privacy Policy GitHub Privacy Policies Cookies and similar technologies This website does not use advertising or tracking cookies.
Preferences (browser storage): User preferences (such as theme) may be stored in browser storage (e.g., localStorage key pref-theme). This information stays on your device and is not sent to the site server. Comments: Loading comments may involve cookies or similar storage mechanisms from Giscus/GitHub. License (CC0 1.0) Unless otherwise stated, the content on this website is dedicated to the public domain under the CC0 1.0 Universal license.
In summary:
You can copy, modify, share, and use the work commercially. No permission is required. Attribution is not required (though appreciated). Creative Commons CC0 1.0 Deed
